trustfund:
TF022150-PHRD 2-PRIVATIZATION PROGRAM
            I/CFS CONL'T,TF029524-PHRD-THIRD STRUCTURAL
            ADJUSTMENT CREDIT (SAC III),TF029197-PHRD-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT CREDIT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Technical Assistance Project
            will: 1) strengthen the Haitian government's capacity
            to design and implement priority policy reforms in the areas
            of public finances and privatization; and 2) provide the
            analytical base for further structural adjustment measures
            with focus on public sector modernization, which will be
            implemented over the next several years. The project will
            also provide complementary finance for consultants, goods
            and services, including training and dissemination of
            information to the public, and incremental operating costs.
            It will provide the government with the means and
            information to advance its economic reform program and
            sustain the actions envisioned under the Second Economic
            Recovery Credit. Specifically, the project will cover the
            areas of public finances, private sector development and
            public sector modernization through the following
            components: 1) property tax reform; 2) expenditure
            management; 3) human resources management system; 4) private
            sector development; 5) public sector modernization; and 6)
            project implementation.
